strings:
<voice_0x0100191F><se_low>Morrie: Wait! Don't go!
If I have upset you, I sorry!
Scusi, scusi!

<voice_0x01001920><se_low>Morrie: I hear it on the wind.
There is someone magnifico come here soon.

<tag_voice_0x01001921><se_low>Morrie: So, <nickname>!
You are a traveller, si?

<tag_voice_0x01001926><se_low>Morrie: Then I ask you one favore!
Here, take these.

<voice_0x0100192B><se_low>Morrie: When we have finished talking,
you take the look at these memos, ay!
<voice_0x0100192C><se_low>Morrie: Each one has written on the informazione of the notorious monsters.

<voice_0x0100192D><se_low>Morrie: Find them!
Fight them!
Send them to me!

<tag_voice_0x0100192E><se_low>Morrie: It is not to worry, <nickname>.
For you, it will be a slice of cake!
I see it in your eyes!
